short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds Switch reviews infos in Nintendo website

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds some meta-informations extracted from Switch Scores (a compilation of Switch games reviews) into the Nintendo game pages: score, reviews, genre, series, and tags.

Please note that it currently only works on Nintendo Europe sites.
